Articles.Content:
Good morning everyone,

I just felt the need to join more rocketheads like me.

I've been playing KSP for about 7-8 months now for a total of 200 hours, and restarted my career every time a major update went up to revisit my gameplay with every new mechanic KSP has to offer.

For this reason I'm still stuck at landing probes on Eve, manned missions on Duna and various activities on close moons.

And since 0.90 came out, well, I guess I'll have to scrap my savegame and begin anew. Again.

I like my game as stock as possible, except for Kethane Mod, K.E.R, and the docking GUI, since I don't really feel like spoiling Squad's work too much.

I hope to bring some useful content to this board, for now I'll lurk some more and see if I fit in somewhere.

See you around!
Welcome to the forum. I also usually start a new campaign with each version. I want to see what the whole experience is like from the start.
